commandDescription: deploy data from CSV files to a Salesforce org
deploydirFlagDescription: directory containing the deployment descriptor 'datadeploy.json' (default: current working directory)
waitperobjectFlagDescription: number of minutes to wait for each bulk API job (default: 5 minutes)
infoDeployDataFromFile: Deploying data for sObject '%s' from file '%s' waiting at most %s minutes
errorDeployDataFailed: Data for sObject '%s' could not be deployed. Error: %s
